other_tests.findings: The biopsy specimen showed severe glomerulitis on light microscopy; 96% of glomeruli showed cellular to early fibrocellular crescents or necrosis. Bright linear immunofluorescence staining for IgG and complement along the glomerular basement membrane, pathognomonic for anti-GBM disease.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Approximately 1 year later, the patient had no recurrent vasculitic events, and ANCA and anti-GBM antibody levels were undetectable.
